item.title: Forest of Life, During Aichlyys
item.description: Forest of Life During Aichlyys Region OverWorld Rarity Uncommon Initiative Power   On those rare nights when the triad stars of Lup, Lec, and Teo shine above the forest, all secrets are brought to light In the Animation, during the events of When a CodeMaster Calls, Ulmar, impersonated by Ulmanator, was taking a beating from Peyton’s Vinta, flying around with his Torwegg, appearing and disappearing with his Invisibility at Rao’Pa Sahkk, the Ocean with no Water, one of the many Mirage Locations in Al’Mipedim.

item.description: Rarity Energy Mugicians Rare 50 1         45 65 40 50 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 3'8"Weight 90 lbsEyes Royal Blue Hair Turkey Red Skin Lime Green Loyalty M'arrillians   In the Animation, during the M’arrillian Invasion, in order to maximize the effects of their plan of flooding all of Perim, the M’arrillians had to reshape part of the land by building dams in strategic Locations.

item.title: Lake Ken-I-Po, Ritual Site
item.description: Lake Ken-I-Po, Ritual Site Region OverWorld Rarity Rare Initiative Number of Elements   As the towers emerged, all wondered what more lay below the surface The Ascension of Kaizeph is more than just the emergence of the City of Elements to the skies of Perim, it’s a ritual occurring in Lake Ken-I-Po.

item.title: Lava Pond
item.description: The Lava Pond is a region on the south-southwest part of the UnderWorld.

item.title: Lava Pond, Milla'iin's Foothold
item.description: Lava Pond Milla'iin's Foothold Region UnderWorld Rarity Rare Initiative Power   In the Animation, during the M’arrillian Invasion, in order to maximize the flooding caused by the melting of the frozen mountains of the Glacier Plains, Perim had to be partially reshaped. Milla’iin, a M’arrillian Chieftain, established a foothold in the Lava Pond commanding Khybon, the first of the Creatures Phelphor successfully brainwashed, to build enormous pipes on the East walls of the Lava Pond in order to inundate everything with the waters of Everrain.

item.title: Ulmar, Wavescrambler
item.description: Rarity Energy Mugicians Super Rare 30 0         35 55 65 65 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 4'4"Weight 133.5 lbsEyes Dark Purple Skin Forest Green Loyalty UnderWorlders Enemies M'arrillians   In the Animation, during the final battle against the M’arrillians, during the events of Legions of Aa’une, right when Phelphor thought the battle was won, Ibiaan, Kelvedran, Akkrean, Screamer, Mallash and several other Creatures of the Tribal Alliance, along with their own footsoldiers, all of them led by an enraged Takinom, Shadowknight show up to even up the score.
